job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p>We are looking for multiple excellent software engineers to join our team. You are a good fit if </p> <p>you love to get hands-on and solve any problem on the way to building our first product, which </p> <p>can include obtaining and cleaning data, training ML models, putting models into production, </p> <p>front-end and back-end development, and more. You have an enthusiastic attitude and you </p> <p>know how to combine scrappiness with discipline and quality. </p><p><br> </p><p>Responsibilities:&nbsp; </p><p><br> </p> <ul><li>Create point-in-time data repositories updated in real time or daily </li><li>Understand the fixed income domain in detail and prepare data using this understanding </li><li>Train state of the art deep learning models using TensorFlow </li><li>Productionize models in APIs that are easy to use by our customers </li><li>Build web interfaces for human consumptios </li></ul><p><br> </p><p>Qualifications: </p><p><br> </p> <ul><li>Degree in computer science or a related area </li><li>&nbsp;Excellent communication and interpersonal skills </li><li>&nbsp;Significant experience as a professional software engineer </li><li>&nbsp;Strong interest in capital markets and in joining a startup </li><li>&nbsp;Preferred: Experience with Python, cloud computing, TensorFlow, and serverless </li><li>&nbsp;Preferred: Experience building for high availability, low latency, and high throughput </li><li>&nbsp;Preferred: Degree in finance or similar qualification such as CFA </li><li>&nbsp;Preferred: Ability to grow rapidly into a manager, and/or into a principal engineer </li></ul> <p><br> </p><p>What We Offer: </p><p><br> </p> <ul><li>Diverse and inclusive environment committed to equal opportunity </li><li>Excellent salary, equity, health insurance, 401K, and other benefits </li><li>Opportunity to work directly with founders who include a top professor of machine learning, a successful serial entrepreneur, and a managing director from a top-ranked investment bank </li><li>Rapid U.S. visa sponsorship available</li></ul>
